title: Public service announcement riot knows there is a problem they are working on it right now

replies.body: Thanks for helping out hammer3! We're aware of the issue with our login servers and are working on getting those back up asap.
thank you for all you do you get a lot of hate sometime but there are some of us who really appreciate what you do to keep the game running
Have they made a comment anywhere?
they say they know there is a problem thats all we got sadly
